title: Former HUL CEO Sanjiv Mehta teams up with PE fund L Catterton for India-focused JV
description: Sanjiv Mehta partners with L Catterton to launch an India-focused investment vehicle, aiming to shape the future of consumer businesses. The joint venture will benefit from Mehta's experience at Hindustan Unilever and L Catterton's global expertise.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
